channel.title: Smith459 - a lightweight #459 framework
channel.description:
[ul][list][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/90axX70.png[/img] [SIZE=7]DOWNLOAD: http://uppit.com/9hpit4a31r6e/smith459_release_v1.1.rar[/SIZE] [B][SIZE=5][U]Introduction[/U][/SIZE][/B] Smith459 is an emulator for the Runescape #459 client. I'm releasing this because I'm pretty much done with RSPS. I'd rather let other people use it, and make improvements to it rather than letting it rot on my desktop. [QUOTE][B][SIZE=5]Media:[/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://oi62.tinypic.com/x1j885.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi62.tinypic.com/r9ieqv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/2r53vw7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/b4viqg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://oi62.tinypic.com/2czsfis.jpg[/img] [/QUOTE]
[QUOTE][list] [B][SIZE=5]Core:[/SIZE][/B] [*]Netty 4.1 implementation for login and packet decoding [*]Player updating - Graphics block [*]Player updating - Animation block [*]Player updating - Single hit block [*]Player updating - Double hit block [*]Player updating - Chat block [*]Npc updating - Graphics block [*]Npc updating - Animation block [*]Npc updating - Single hit block [*]Npc updating - Double hit block [*]Entity walking [*]Microsoft access SQL driver implementation for loadable data [*]Item definition loading [*]Npc definition loading [*]Private messaging packet [*]Equipment bonus updating [*]Friends and ignore list [*]Character design [*]Player skill level and experience loading and saving [*]Object definition loading [*]Entity running [*]Entity teleporting [*]Banking [*]Trading [*]Shopping [/list]
[/QUOTE][/list][/ul]

item.title: Smith459 - a lightweight #459 framework
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Dan0194:

No offence it looks like you stole from other frameworks like your walking queue class is stolen from hyperion.

Everyone starts somewhere. Not only that but how many different ways can you write a walking queue where it wouldn’t look even remotely similar to other released frameworks? Even if he did take it, so what? No need to reinvent the wheel.

Read full topic

item.title: Smith459 - a lightweight #459 framework
item.dc:creator: @legionx legionx
item.description:
@legionx wrote:

[ul][list]
[SIZE=7]DOWNLOAD: http://uppit.com/9hpit4a31r6e/smith459_release_v1.1.rar[/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=5][U]Introduction[/U][/SIZE][/B]
Smith459 is an emulator for the Runescape #459 client. I’m releasing this because I’m pretty much done with RSPS. I’d rather let other people use it, and make improvements to it rather than letting it rot on my desktop.

[QUOTE][B][SIZE=5]Media:[/SIZE][/B]





[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE][list]
[B][SIZE=5]Core:[/SIZE][/B]
[]Netty 4.1 implementation for login and packet decoding
[]Player updating - Graphics block
[]Player updating - Animation block
[]Player updating - Single hit block
[]Player updating - Double hit block
[]Player updating - Chat block
[]Npc updating - Graphics block
[]Npc updating - Animation block
[]Npc updating - Single hit block
[]Npc updating - Double hit block
[]Entity walking
[]Microsoft access SQL driver implementation for loadable data
[]Item definition loading
[]Npc definition loading
[]Private messaging packet
[]Equipment bonus updating
[]Friends and ignore list
[]Character design
[]Player skill level and experience loading and saving
[]Object definition loading
[]Entity running
[]Entity teleporting
[]Banking
[]Trading
[*]Shopping
[/list]

[/QUOTE][/list][/ul]

Read full topic
